details.description: Kaldereta or caldereta is a goat meat stew from the Philippines. Variations of the dish use beef, chicken or pork. Commonly the goat meat is stewed with vegetables and a liver paste. Vegetables may include tomatoes, potatoes, olives, bell peppers and hot peppers; kaldereta sometimes includes tomato sauce.

steps.value: Heat the oil in a cooking pot.
Once the oil is hot, saute the garlic and onion.
Add the chicken. Stir and cook for for 5 minutes or until the color turns light to medium brown.
